thread.title: ZAALIMA LYRICS – Raees | Arijit Singh | ShahRukh Khan, Mahira Khan
thread.title_full: ZAALIMA LYRICS – Raees | Arijit Singh | ShahRukh Khan, Mahira Khan

author: lyricsmint
title: ZAALIMA LYRICS – Raees | Arijit Singh | ShahRukh Khan, Mahira Khan
text:
SHARES Zaalima Song - Raees Zaalima Lyrics from Raees starring Shah Rukh Khan and Mahira Khan. The song is sung by Arijit Singh and Harshdeep Kaur, composed by Pritam’s JAM8 studio members Kaushik & Akash while Zalima lyrics are penned by Amitabh Bhattacharya. Zaalima Lyrics 
Jo teri khatir tadpe pehle se hi Kya usey tadpana o zaalima, o zaalima Jo tere ishq mein behka pehle se hi Kya usey behkana o zaalima, o zaalima 
Aankhen marhaba, baatein marhaba Main sau martaba deewana huaa Mera na raha jab se dil mera Tere husn ka nishana hua 
Jiski har dhadkan tu ho Aise dil ko kya dhadkana O zaalima, o zalima.. 
Saanson mein teri nazdeeqiyon ka Itrr tu ghol de, ghol de… 
Main hi kyun ishq zaahir karun Tu bhi kabhi bol de, bol de… 
Leke jaan hi jaayega meri Qaatil har tera bahaana hua 
Tujhse hi shuru Mere pyaar ka fasaana hua 
Tu shamma hai toh yaad rakhna Main bhi hoon parwaana 
Deedaar tera milne ke baad hi Chhoote meri angdaayi
